text: Okja (; ) is a 2017 South Korean American action adventure movie directed by Bong Joon-ho and starring Tilda Swinton, Choi Woo-shik, Ahn Seo-hyun, Paul Dano, Jake Gyllenhaal, Shirley Henderson, Giancarlo Esposito, Lily Collins, Daniel Henshall, Devon Bostick. ==Other websites== * Category:2017 action movies Category:2017 adventure movies Category:South Korean movies Category:American action movies Category:American adventure movies Category:Movies directed by Bong Joon-ho
title: Okja
